Title: Dragon Heart: Adventures Beyond This World
Actors: Masumi Asano, Shigeru Chiba, Rica Fukami
Plot: Ryusuke is a junior high school student living in Tokyo. During his summer vacation, he visits Tokushima and reunites with his teenage cousin, Tomomi. Ryusuke and Tomomi go outing to the Anabuki River where they get swept away by ...
